channel.title: Cloud on Martin_Trojer
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud on Martin_Trojer

item.title: Developing Clojure in the Cloud
item.description: Recently, I gave a talk at the Clojure eXchange 2014 titled ‘Developing Clojure in the Cloud’. I described a way of creating and using (Clojure) development environments inside VMs. I’ve been developing like this for the last year (spanning 2 projects).
